segment.source: Do's and don'ts
segment.target: Do's and don'ts

segment.source: Use an entrance animation when there is a set of new items to bring into an empty container.
segment.target: Use an entrance animation when there is a set of new items to bring into an empty container.

segment.source: For example, after the initial load of an app, part of the app's content might not be immediately available for display.
segment.target: For example, after the initial load of an app, part of the app's content might not be immediately available for display.

segment.source: When that content is ready to be shown, use a content transition animation to bring that late content into the view.
segment.target: When that content is ready to be shown, use a content transition animation to bring that late content into the view.

segment.source: Use content transitions to replace one set of content with another set of content that already resides in the same container within a view.
segment.target: Use content transitions to replace one set of content with another set of content that already resides in the same container within a view.

segment.source: When bringing in new content, slide that content up (from bottom to top) into the view against the general page flow or reading order.
segment.target: When bringing in new content, slide that content up (from bottom to top) into the view against the general page flow or reading order.

segment.source: Introduce new content in a logical manner, for example, introduce the most important piece of content last.
segment.target: Introduce new content in a logical manner, for example, introduce the most important piece of content last.

segment.source: If you have more than one container whose content is to be updated, trigger all of the transition animations simultaneously without any staggering or delay.
segment.target: If you have more than one container whose content is to be updated, trigger all of the transition animations simultaneously without any staggering or delay.

segment.source: Don't use content transition animations when the entire page is changing.
segment.target: Don't use content transition animations when the entire page is changing.

segment.source: In that case, use the page transition animations instead.
segment.target: In that case, use the page transition animations instead.

segment.source: Don't use content transition animations if the content is only refreshing.
segment.target: Don't use content transition animations if the content is only refreshing.

segment.source: Content transition animations are meant to show movement.
segment.target: Content transition animations are meant to show movement.

segment.source: For refreshes, use fade animations.
segment.target: For refreshes, use fade animations.
